channel.title: WinForm on 张杰的博客
channel.description: Recent content in WinForm on 张杰的博客

item.title: C#_WinFrom项目打开Console接收输出
item.description: 在Program.cs Class开头引入 using System.Runtime.InteropServices; [DllImport("kernel32.dll")] public static extern Boolean AllocConsole(); [DllImport("kernel32.dll")] public static extern Boolean FreeConsole(); 调用AllocConsole()开启 调用FreeConsole()关闭 代码 using /....../ using System.Runtime.InteropServices; namespace ...... { static class Program { /// <summary> /// The main entry point for the application. /// </summary> /// [DllImport("kernel32.dll")] public static extern Boolean AllocConsole(); [DllImport("kernel32.dll")] public static extern Boolean FreeConsole(); [STAThread] static void Main() { AllocConsole(); /....../ FreeConsole(); } } }

item.title: C#_自定义控件加入工具箱
item.description: 在 工具->选项->Windows 窗口设计器->常规 将 自动填充工具箱 设置为 True 这样建立的自定义窗体控件就会在编译后自动加入工具箱
